title: Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy - Afrika 40-41 Mod
description:
This mod originally seeded by by http://www.closecombatseries.net

Name: Afrika 40'41
For: Close Combat 5 - Invasion Normandy
Version: 1.1
By: JimRM2

Description: This mod takes you back to the early days of the Afrika campaign. You can fight as either the British with thier Commonwealth Allies, or as the Italians. This mod features 44 new maps, all new data, tons of new graphics, new sounds and a great strategic map.

Installation:

1. Full installation of Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy required. (Not included)
2. Install CC5_Patch_v5.01a.exe (Included)
3. Install Cfg13.zip (This is the Config Manager used to install mods - included)
4. Unzip CC5_Afrika4041_mappack.zip to C:/Program Files/SSI/Close Combat Invasion Normandy/Maps or equivalent folder.
5. Unzip CC5_Afrika4041_v1.1.zip to C:/Config Manager/Plugins or equivalent.
6. Run the Config Manager and install Afrika4041_v1_1.
7. Play CC5

Notes: The CC5_Afrika4041_video is optional. Unzip this file to the C:/Program Files/SSI/Close Combat Invasion Normandy/videos folder. This video replaces the original video 

made by Atomic Games.

For additional info, patches, how to guides and updates for this mod and all others visit http://www.closecombatseries.net. To play online install the included GameSpy Arcade client (ArcadeInstallFull205-google.exe) and join the Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy Room.
